title: Opening Hours
text: Our opening hours: Mon–Fri 9 am–6 pm, Sat 10 am–2 pm. Closed on Sundays and public holidays.

title: Contact
text: Contact form at /contact. Response time usually 1–2 business days.

title: Legal Notice
text: Legal provider identification: see /impressum.

title: Privacy Policy
text: Information on data processing and your rights: /privacy-policy.

title: Terms & Conditions
text: Our General Terms and Conditions can be found at /terms-and-conditions.

title: Create Account
text: You can create a free customer account at /account/register.

title: Login
text: To log in, go to /account/login.

title: Reset Password
text: Password reset at /account/reset. Link will be sent by email (valid for 10 minutes).

title: Newsletter
text: Newsletter sign-up at /newsletter/subscribe (double opt-in). Unsubscribe anytime via any email.

title: Place Order
text: Add products to the shopping cart and pay at checkout. Guest checkout possible.

title: Change Order
text: As long as it hasn’t shipped, changes via /contact with order number.

title: Cancel Order
text: Cancellation possible until shipment. Afterwards, please use the returns process.

title: Payment Methods
text: We accept credit card, PayPal, SEPA direct debit, instant transfer, invoice (subject to verification).

title: Invoice
text: Invoices are sent by email after shipment and can be accessed in your account.

title: Prices & VAT
text: All prices include statutory VAT plus shipping costs unless otherwise stated.

title: Shipping Countries
text: Delivery within DE, AT, CH. Details and costs: /shipping/countries.

title: Shipping Costs
text: Within DE free shipping from €49, otherwise €4.90. AT/CH see /shipping/costs.

title: Delivery Times
text: DE: 2–3 business days, AT/CH: 3–5 business days. Express available at extra cost.

title: Order Tracking
text: Tracking link sent by email after shipment or in your account under Orders.

title: Returns
text: Free returns within 30 days via /returns (generate return label).

title: Right of Withdrawal
text: You can withdraw within 14 days without giving any reason. Form: /withdrawal.

title: Warranty
text: Statutory warranty 24 months. Manufacturer warranties see product page.

title: Technical Support
text: Technical questions: /support/technical or email support@example.com.

title: System Status
text: Current outages and maintenance at /status.

title: Accessibility
text: Accessibility statement and contact: /accessibility.

title: Cookies
text: Cookie policy and opt-out at /cookies.

title: Browser Support
text: Supported: current versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge.

title: Locations
text: Stores & pickup points with opening hours: /locations.

title: Careers
text: Job openings and applications at /careers.

title: Book Appointment
text: Book consultation appointments online: /appointments.

title: Coupons & Discounts
text: Enter coupon codes in the cart. Terms at /discounts.

title: Business Customers
text: B2B offers, bulk orders, payment terms: /b2b.

title: Pickup
text: Click & Collect available within 2 hours. Pickup notice by email.

title: Emergency Contact
text: Outside business hours: emergency email notfall@example.com (critical cases only).
